column1: 1731|17:31|They discussed the transmission: which of their friends
column3: was responsible for it? But at 17:31 Pick called back

column1:
1731|5:31 P.M.|Tuesday 5:31 P.M.
"It's the best I can manage
column2: Michael." Nogami's voice was apologetic. "Nobody knows I keep this place
column3:
not even my wife."
"Afternoon business conferences."
"You catch my meaning." He smiled and walked on up the sandstone steps.
